message: I propose a fair division, keeping most of the money for myself as I have the power to reject any offer you make.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you the majority of the money. Take it or leave it.
I'm taking a significant loss due to inflation, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up much more. You're not getting the majority of the money without a fight.
